_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Redis
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Redis是一个开源（BSD许可）的内存数据结构存储，用作数据库、缓存和消息代理。它支持字符串、哈希、列表、集合、带范围查询的有序集合、位图、超日志、带半径查询的地理空间索引和流等数据结构。
startup: redis-server --bind 0.0.0.0 --port {{SERVER_PORT}} --requirepass {{SERVER_PASSWORD}} --maxmemory {{SERVER_MEMORY}}mb --daemonize yes && redis-cli -p {{SERVER_PORT}} -a {{SERVER_PASSWORD}} && redis-cli -p {{SERVER_PORT}} -a {{SERVER_PASSWORD}} shutdown save

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Redis Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

sleep 5
echo -e "Install complete. Made this to not have issues."

variables.name: Redis密码
variables.description: Redis用于保护服务器的密码。
